Docs.summary: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist. Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed. F:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction.None?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is the default action if no P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True handler is provided.
